detaileddescription.para: The information of memory devices on the board

briefdescription.para: The default regions assigned for application to use, by default, each region will use all the space of each memory device User can config the start address and the size of the regions to limit the application using.

The default regions used to generate link script User can select region by configuring REGION_ROM and REGION_RAM For REGION_ROM, REGION_ICCM, REGION_EXT_RAM are available For REGION_RAM, REGION_DCCM and REGION_EXT_RAM are available.

listitem.para: This header file will contain the memory resources on the board
User can select different region for applications by configuring REGION_ROM and REGION_RAM
The unit of XXXX_SIZE is Byte
